Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness

Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: It's so hard to forget pain but it's even harder to remember sweetness

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Happiness is when what you think what you say  and what you do are in harmony

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life

Author: Stephen Chbosky
Quote: There's nothing like deep breaths after laughing that hard. Nothing in the world like a sore stomach for the right reason

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
Quote: Every man has his secret sorrows which the world knows not; and often times we call a man cold when he is only sad

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions

Author: John Lenon
Quote: Count your age by friends not years. Count your life by smiles not tears

Author: J.R.R Toliken
Quote: If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold it would be a merrier world

Author: Tom Bodett
Quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love something to do and something to hope for

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Happiness is a warm puppy

Author: Stephen Chbosky
Quote: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.

Author: David Levithan
Quote: Breathing is hard. When you cry so much it makes you realize that breathing is hard.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness

Author: Leonardo da Vinci
Quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain

Author: Dorothy Thompson
Quote: To have felt too much is to end in feeling nothing

Author: Henry Rollins
Quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew

Author: George Elliot
Quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses we must plant more roses

Author: Tabitha Suzuma
Quote: As the light begins to intensify so does my misery and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong

Author: Margaret Mitchell
Quote: Life's under no obligation to give us what we expect

Author: John Lenon
Quote: One thing you can't hide — is when you're crippled inside

Author: Arthur C. Clarke
Quote: Two possibilities exist: either we are alone in the Universe or we are not. Both are equally terrifying

Author: Christopher Morley
Quote: Heavy hearts like heavy clouds in the sky are best relieved by the letting of a little water

Author: Norman Cousins
Quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live

Author: Bob Marley
Quote: The good times of today are the sad thoughts of tomorrow

Author: Leonardo Da Vinci
Quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain
